name: Renewable
description: Our game focuses on four minigames which reflect the four major renewable energy sources in todays age. These are Solar,  Geothermal, Wind and Hydro Energy. The reason we decided on this approach was because we wanted to promote the great efforts we are making as a species to become self sufficient and to make players aware of the struggle to combat Global Warming. The player must complete all levels to complete the game were they will be greeted with a credits scene.
